title: Hey GD, some of you are pretty smart
body:
So answer me this. Which is cheaper?

$6.19 + $5.00
OR
$8.19 + $2.00

First order is a sandwich by itself + a poutine by itself,
Second order is that same sandwich in a combo meal, which adds a soft drink, and it has the optional upgrade to make the fries included with the meal a poutine for just $2.00.

If it helps, think of the second order this way:

$6.19 + $2.00 + $2.00

So, which is cheaper and by how much?
